title: Elephants: Giant Mammals
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 198 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 480L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     R and Y
description: The largest of all land animals, elephants are amazing. Students will enjoy learning all about these giants, from their families to their eating habits. Colorful pictures and maps support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
